description:
Where do YOU draw the line? “Wireless radiation has biological effects, period. These effects are seen in all life forms, plants, animals, insects...in humans, we have clear evidence of cancer now. There is no question.”
– Dr Sharon Goldberg from the Medical Advisory Board - Michigan
.
“Putting in tens of millions of 5G antennae without a single biological test of safety has got to be about the stupidest idea anyone has had in the history of the world.”
– Dr Martin Pall, PhD and Professor Emeritus of Biochemistry and Basic Medical Sciences at Washington State University  @
.
“If …5G come to fruition, no person, no animal, no bird, no insect and no plant on Earth will be able to avoid exposure, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, to levels of …radiation that are tens to hundreds of times greater than what exists today, without any possibility of escape anywhere on the planet.”
–  5G international Space Appeal signed by thousands of scientists, doctors, building biologists.
.
“I see 10 to 20 new patients each week and one third of those tumours are in the area of the brain around the ear. I personally believe there is a link between tumours and the EMR exposure.”
- DR CHARLIE TEO – Australian top brain surgeon @charlieteofoundation  #wildandfreechildren #wokeaf #worldschooling #bees #biologyislife #5g #stop5g #no5g #gatheringofnations #peoplehavethepower 
#plandemic  #fuckbillgates #coronavirus #agenda21
#scamdemic  #newworldorder #vaccine  #freeamerica #freedom
